PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-03142013-03-21TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (Standard 126)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE SAFETY REGULATIONS (STANDARD 126) in order to re-introduce into Schedule IV of the Motor Vehicule Safety Regulations the same safety standard that first established mandatory installation of electonic stability control systems on light-duty vehicles, which was inadvertently repealed from the Regulations pursuant to a 2011 amendment.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0055 Publication Date: 2013-04-10
AttachmentsAttachment
